item.title: The ACA Was the Largest Single Tax Increase in 50 Years
item.description:
In fact, the ACA is the single largest tax increase in my lifetime history.

— Karen Handel, telephone town hall

Claims:

The ACA Was the Largest Single Tax Increase in 50 Years
The Truth:
There have been 3 larger in constant dollar terms, or 6 relative to the size of the economy.

Fact Checks:

PolitiFact
Using constant dollars, three tax laws ranked higher. Relative to the size of the U.S. economy and federal revenues the year before, six tax hikes were larger than those in the Affordable Care Act.

item.title: The US Has the Highest Corporate Tax Rate in the World
item.description:
Because the United States has the highest corporate rates in the world, and we need to start to draw those down in order to be more competitive.

— Karen Handel, telephone town hall

Claims:

The US Has the Highest Corporate Tax Rate in the World
The Truth:
The US does have a high statutory rate (up to 35%), but significant deductions and exemptions mean companies actually end up paying a much lower rate; the effective tax rate is about average. Furthermore, while the statutory rate relatively high, it is not the highest in the world; that distinction goes to the United Arab Emirates with rates up to 55%.
